attributes.action: Get the Teasury to meet its commitment to Equitable Life policyholders
attributes.additional_details: Meet your commitment to Equitable Life policy holdersas its the 24thJune12 and theres only 1 week to go before you let us down for the third time.I have not even had any communcation from the Treasury.Its the annuitants who have lost most >I am now 82 & I thought Imy wife and I would have a comfortable retirement 11 years have past and have not only suffered financially but also our quality of life not being able to have an holiday or eat out ,travel far. Please meet you obligations and get commercial.Stan Nin.sdi_edi@yahoo.co.uk
